price: Akasema: Je, nikutafutieni mungu asiye kuwa Mwenyezi Mungu, na Yeye ndiye aliye kufadhilisheni juu ya viumbe vyote?
arabic: قَالَ أَغَيۡرَ ٱللَّهِ أَبۡغِيكُمۡ إِلَٰهٗا وَهُوَ فَضَّلَكُمۡ عَلَى ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
footnotes: Je, nikutafutieni wa kuabudiwa asiye kuwa Mwenyezi Mungu Mola Mlezi wa viumbe vyote, na Yeye ndiye aliye kupeni fadhila, na akakupeni neema asio pata kupewa mwengine asiye kuwa nyinyi katika zama zenu?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla aghayra al-lahi abghīkum ilāhan wahuwa faḍḍalakum ʿalā al-ʿālamīna
